songs.title: C.R.E.A.M.
songs.lyrics:
Fuck Y'all

[Hook]
You swear your pussy clean
But my loving ain't free, so I ain't gonna fuck you right now
You say you down for the team
But my loving ain't free, so I ain't gonna fuck you right now
I know you wanna live out your dreams
I want that white bitch sunny side up like a [?]
She want me bussin bussin bussin out the cream yeah
She want me bussin bussin bussin out the cream yeah
She want me bussin bussin bussin bussin bussin

[Verse]
Sorry mamma, imma buss up on that bitch like woah woah
Wear a condom on that hoe, I cannot be no bozo
This is strictly fun yeah, I ain't with the class
But I get more pussy than niggas who sit in class
First M make her act like that, she see two Ms make her act like a brat
First she fuck with trigger, then she fuck my nigga yeah
Hope this bitch ?
?
White bitch like the whips and the chains
Got me feeling like it's 12 years a slave
I just tell the bitch to give me head, yeah

[Hook x2]
You swear your pussy clean, you best say hell yeah
But I ain't gonna fuck you right now
You say you down for the team, you best say hell yeah
But I ain't gonna fuck you right now
I know you wanna live out your dreams
I want that white bitch sunny side up like a [?]
She want me bussin bussin bussin out the cream yeah
She want me bussin bussin bussin out the cream yeah
She want me bussin bussin bussin out the cream yeah

[Outro]
First she fuck with trigger, then she fuck my nigga yeah
Hope this bitch ?
?
White bitch like the whips and the chains
Got me feeling like it's 12 years a slave
I just tell the bitch to give me head, yeah
I just tell the bitch to give me head, yeah
I just tell the bitch to give me head, yeah

I know you want to live out you dreams
I know you want to live out you dreams, yeah
